Just to note. There's only 2 of us. Me and Noam. I was indicating I was Hunter S, and he was Raoul.

Anyway, road trip tomorrow. Me and Noam, Raoul and Dr Gonzo. Soft-top. Roof down. Floyd on the 8-track. 

"They went looking for America"
Listen to the bro next time. The bro knows the dialectic.
But no, it's trans this and BLM that, and everyday feminism the other and before you know it, a fascist orange shitgibbon is President.
What happened to just listening to guys? Guys who know where to lead the movement? White guys. In their early 40s. Called Paul.
This is what happens if you stop listening to dudes and fixate on ID politics and your intersectional nonsense. You get TRUMP.
(There's lines you don't cross, man. That's one)
(They mean his inauguration ball which is being held in the centre rather than any injury to his genitalia, which I do not encourage)

The shout has gone up "Crush Trump's Balls!"

Man, Harry Leslie just torched a limo! Go, dude! Burn down this corrupt city of lies and neo-liberal elites!
It's kicking off like Chicago '68, Berlin '89 or Chigwell High Street September 23rd '03 (crazy times all).

My wife never liked it. I'm glad I left. I've never been happier.
But it's like I said to the lads on the last night out - "What happens in Krondtadt STAYS in Kronstadt".
I'm so glad I left my job at channel 4. I was getting stale. Going nowhere. Now new vistas await me. A whole new life. A Canary column!
25 is good. 25 is how many points Labour led by before the neoliberal chicken coup.
Typically of this stage of late capitalism, a cultural venue like Fabric closes down. I was about to visit with my new girlfriend. She's 25.
The time has come for this country to embrace a radical she left. I mean, left. Nobody left me. I left her. And I've never been happier.
When people ask me how many Labour MPs should be deselected, I say "28", which coincidentally is still my waistband. Leather trousers. Yeah.
